text: I want to schedule an 'April Fools Strategy Session' for this coming Saturday at 11:00 AM for one hour. The attendees will be Mike Chen and Laura Palmer, and it will be an Online/Virtual meeting. Also, please remind Mike Chen the day before to prepare Q2 brainstorming notes.
Okay, I can help with that. To schedule the meeting and set the reminder, I'll need to authenticate you. What's your username and password?
My username is newuser and my password is newpass.
Thanks, Alice! You're authenticated. Let me just confirm today's date to correctly schedule for 'this coming Saturday'.
Today is March 31, 2023, which is a Friday. So 'this coming Saturday' is April 1, 2023.

It looks like Mike Chen has a 'Team Building Activity' scheduled from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM on Saturday, April 1st. This conflicts with your proposed 11:00 AM start for the 'April Fools Strategy Session'. Would another time on Saturday work, for example, in the afternoon?
Ah, you're right. Let's try 1:00 PM on Saturday, April 1st, for that one hour instead. And yes, please still set that reminder for Mike Chen.
Meeting 'April Fools Strategy Session' scheduled successfully for April 1st, 2023, 1:00 PM - 2:00 PM.
